title: Burntmeat

properties.name: description
properties.value: Burntmeat is a troll featured in the quests Eadgar's Ruse and My Arm's Big Adventure . He can be found in the Troll Stronghold kitchen. He is sometimes criticised by other trolls for only being able to cook burnt meat. Most trolls are named after the first thing they eat, however, Burntmeat was named after the first thing he tried to cook.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Burntmeat
This article is about the non-player character. For the item, see Burnt meat.
Burntmeat
Released24 August 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceTroll
LocationTroll Stronghold kitchen

Map
Advanced data
NPC ID4157

Burntmeat is a troll featured in the quests Eadgar's Ruse and My Arm's Big Adventure . He can be found in the Troll Stronghold kitchen. He is sometimes criticised by other trolls for only being able to cook burnt meat. Most trolls are named after the first thing they eat, however, Burntmeat was named after the first thing he tried to cook.

Burntmeat believes that he is a master chef, and after Eadgar's Ruse and My Arm's Big Adventure he gives the player a reward, burnt meat, which he claims is very valuable.
